titles.title: Safe Interstate Meat Shipment Act
To permit the interstate distribution of State-inspected meat under appropriate circumstances.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 6/27/2007--Introduced. Safe Interstate Meat Shipment Act - Amends the Federal Meat Inspection Act and the Poultry Products Inspection Act to permit interstate distribution of state-inspected meat and poultry under specified circumstances.
